wikitext.*:
The '''Undergate''' (also called the under-gate) was a gate with brazen doors that blocked the entrance from the underground side passage that was called the [[Under-way]] to the ground floor of the [[Tower of Cirith Ungol]].<ref>{{RK|Tower}}</ref><ref name=Choices>{{TT|Choices}}</ref>

When [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Sam]] first encountered the Under-way they were in darkness and only perceived that the way was blocked. After Frodo had been stung by [[Shelob]],<ref>{{TT|Lair}}</ref> orcs found Frodo and carried the unconscious Frodo through the Under-way and through the Undergate to the Tower of Cirith Ungol. Sam followed the orcs on the Under-way, but was unable to get through the locked Undergate and was forced to go back to the main tunnel in [[Shelob's Lair]].<ref name=Choices/>
